titles.title: Recognizing that Monsignor Diomartich through his passion of spreading the word of God, has inspired and guided the residents of Los Angeles and has brought unity and pride to the Croatian community.
Recognizing that Monsignor Diomartich through his passion of spreading the word of God, has inspired and guided the residents of Los Angeles and has brought unity and pride to the Croatian community.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Recognizes that Monsignor Diomartich has inspired and guided the residents of Los Angeles and brought unity and pride to the Croatian community.
